name: Finding Your Friend
description:
It was quite a while since the last time I made a game, so this one also ended pretty half-assed given that I made it in just a couple of days. Didn't even use all of the assets I made for it, but hey, at least it turned out better than my last attempt as a solo dev.  Let's see if that means I can make an actually good game in no time!

Made in Godot 3.1 for the Mini Jam 33
